articles.title: Live news: Asian markets follow Wall Street higher as interest rate fears ease - Financial Times
articles.content:
Oil prices notched their steepest fall in more than a year on Wednesday, settling near $85 a barrel and erasing gains from the past month.
Brent crude fell 5.6 per cent to settle at $85.81 a barrel,… [+404 chars]

articles.title: Oil plunges $5 in biggest one-day drop in over a year - Financial Times
articles.description: Demand worries drive sharp reversal after crude neared $100 a barrel last week
articles.content:
Oil prices plunged by more than $5 a barrel on Wednesday over concerns that sharp increases in borrowing costs caused by higher interest rates could dent economic growth.

articles.title: US to incentivise companies to report misdeeds at businesses they buy - Financial Times
articles.description: New Department of Justice enforcement policy will encourage more disclosure of potential misconduct
